DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass use Alma CO2 Pixel FemiLift™ treatment VulvoVaginal Atrophy ( VVA ) postmenopausal female subject . The primary endpoint ass change vaginal dryness mean Visual Analogic Scale ( 10 cm VAS ) and/or Bachmann Index VVA . The clinical improvement assess patient fill Vulvovaginal Atrophy .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective , Open-Label , Single-Center , Non-Comparative Study Assess Use Pixel CO2 Laser System ( FemiLift ) Treatment Vulvovaginal Atrophy ( VVA ) Postmenopausal Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking Woman , age 35 70 yr , menopausal Provided write Informed Consent Exhibiting VVA and/or SUI symptom ( mild moderate SUI , accord severity index develop Sandvik . ) Prolapse stag < II , accord pelvic organ prolapse quantification ( ICSPOPQ ) system Normal PAP smear ( 1 year prior baseline ) Vaginal canal , introitus vestibule free injury bleed Have procedure anatomical area 6 month prior treatment Understand accept obligation logistically able present schedule followup visit Severe prolapse ( POP > = grade 3 ) Use photosensitive drug Acute recurrent urinary tract infection ( UTI ) , genital infection ( e.g . herpes candida ) . Any serious disease , chronic condition , could interfere study compliance Acute actively present within last 2 month HPV/HSV Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding Urge overflow incontinence Patients antidepressant , αadrenergic anticholinergic medication Patients immune system disease . Patients allergic reaction laser . Obese woman ( BMI > 30 ) Patient unable follow posttreatment instruction History keloid formation Received anticipate receive antiplatelets , anticoagulant , thrombolytic , vitamin E anti inflammatories within 2 week pre treatment A history thrombophlebitis A history acute infection A history heart failure Previously undergone reconstructive pelvic surgery Have use vaginal cream , moisturizers , lubricant homeopathic preparation least 3 month Any medical condition investigator opinion would interfere patient participation study
